options.name: user
options.description: This could be an example of how to do dynamic command generation
options.how: use the json present to determine which option functions to call on an object

subcommands.name: editban
subcommands.description: Updates the reason a user was banned

subcommands.name: tempban
subcommands.description: Sets a ban which expires automatically

subcommands.name: softban
subcommands.description: Bans then unbans a user; purges messages

subcommands.name: masskick
subcommands.description: Kicks up to five users at once

name: emoji
description: Commands to update and track emojis

subcommands.name: display
subcommands.description: Displays an emoji in a larger size

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Adds an emoji to the server

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Removes an emoji from the emoji list

subcommands.name: score
subcommands.description: Shows the reaction score for a user

name: clear
description: Commands to tidy up the server and users

subcommands.name: nicknames
subcommands.description: Clears all nicknames from server members

subcommands.name: bot
subcommands.description: Cleans up messages posted by the bot

subcommands.name: purge
subcommands.description: Deletes recent messages from a specified user

subcommands.name: messages
subcommands.description: Deletes a specified number of messages (default 5)
